structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.text:
The Pest Control Advisory Board shall have the following powers and duties:
To review commercial structural pest control and commercial structural fumigation enforcement proceedings and to make written recommendations for further action to the department.
To hold hearings on the denial of an application for a license pursuant to KRS 217B.540.
To review commercial structural pest control and commercial structural fumigation applicator license applications to ensure that the applicants meet state pest control licensing requirements and to make recommendations to the department.
To review the state pest control licensing examinations.
To assist the department in administering the licensing examinations for commercial structural pest control applicators and commercial structural fumigation applicators and to make recommendations to the department.
To serve as a resource group to keep the department informed of current technical advancements in the pest control industry.
To recommend reasonable rules and regulations concerning the following matters:
Standards of application and workmanship.
Proper health and safety precautions.
Requirements for standardized structural pest control contracts.
Furnishing of reports and information necessary for the Pest Control Advisory Board to carry out the provisions of KRS 217B.515 to 217B.585.
To assist the department in administering the licensing examinations for the commercial structural pest control applicators and commercial structural fumigation applicators and to make recommendations to the department.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 67, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.
